scripts.appsync.ios: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoIOS ios --description 'AppSync iOS version!'
scripts.appsync.ios.mandatory: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoIOS ios --mandatory --description 'Mandatory iOS version!'
scripts.appsync.android: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoAndroid android --description 'AppSync Android version!'
scripts.appsync.android.mandatory: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoAndroid android --mandatory --description 'Mandatory AppSync Android version!'
scripts.appsync.android.v2: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoAndroid android --description 'Awesome Android version!' --targetBinaryVersion 2.0.0
scripts.appsync.android.release: nativescript-app-sync release AppSyncDemoAndroid android -deploymentName Staging --build --isReleaseBuildType --keystorePath "/Users/eddyverbruggen/Desktop/werkmap/Android dev X-Services/xservices.keystore" --keystorePassword YOUR_PASSWORD --keystoreAlias xservices --keystoreAliasPassword YOUR_PASSWORD
scripts.build.plugin: cd ../src && npm i && npm run build && npm run package
